entry.title: [CW] In another 'what the fuck is even going on" new from Ukraine, [someone killed \~
entry.content:
In another 'what the fuck is even going on" new from Ukraine, [someone killed \~53 Azov POWs in a makeshift detention camp in an industrial building 15 km from the frontline.](https://edition.cnn.com/2022/07/29/europe/donetsk-prison-strike-ukraine-russia-intl/index.html)
Ukraine says Russians did it themselves with IEDs,[covered by sound of a MLRS battery firing nearby.](https://twitter.com/wartranslated/status/1553037563065155585)
Since Russia has been very clear they're in Ukraine to 'denazify it', killing their own nazi-tatto covered walking propaganda prizes they could have hanged at their own leisure .. doesn't make a lot of sense.
Russians say it was Ukrainians using GMLRS missiles and have produced some wreckage. There were some POWs videos of Azov prisoners recently, but I don't really see the motivation - nobody with a brain should take POW videos seriously; people under duress will say anything.
